Name: Average time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants where both activities occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes to reach SW-Reviewer Agreed after Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation in the variant with the shortest duration
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time elapsed from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in the longest-performing variant
Metric: The maximum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average waiting time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and the next human-driven activity (excluding SYSTEM-generated notifications) before SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total resolution time of the phase initiated by Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and concluded by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed compared to the time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed versus the elapsed time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Cycle time of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation when followed by a successful reviewer agreement (i.e., SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs within 14 days)
Metric: the average of the function base < 14 where base is the duration between the first time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and the last time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases that eventually lead to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that include reminder activities (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in comparison with the time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation in submissions that required multiple reviewer invitations
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases where Plagiarism Originality Report Completed precedes SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time for the segment starting at Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and ending at SW-Reviewer Agreed, grouped by case:concept:name
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
